### The HTTP tool is drastically simplifies API-enabled AI agents cutting down the number of workflow nodes by as much as 10!

* Available since v1.47.0
* Recommended for single purpose APIs which don't require much post-fetch formatting.
* If you require a chain of API calls, you may need to implement a subworkflow instead.

### Need Help?
Join the [Discord](https://discord.com/invite/XPKeKXeB7d) or ask in the [Forum](https://community.n8n.io/)!

readme:
This n8n template showcases the new HTTP tool released in version 1.47.0.

Overall, the tool helps simplify AI Agent workflows where custom sub-workflows were performing the same simple http requests.

## Comparisons

### 1\. AI agent that can scrape webpages

Remake of <https://n8n.io/workflows/2006-ai-agent-that-can-scrape-webpages/>

**Changes** :

  * Replaces Execute Workflow Tool and Subworkflow
  * Replaces Response Formatting



### 2\. Allow your AI to call an API to fetch data

Remake of <https://n8n.io/workflows/2094-allow-your-ai-to-call-an-api-to-fetch-data/>

**Changes** :

  * Replaces Execute Workflow Tool and Subworkflow
  * Replaces Manual Query Params Definitions
  * Replaces Response Formatting
readme_zh:
此n8n模板展示了1.47.0版本发布的全新HTTP工具。

总体而言，该工具能显著简化AI智能体工作流——以往需要通过定制子流程实现的简单HTTP请求，现在可直接通过该工具完成。

## 对比案例

### 1. 网页抓取AI智能体

重构自<https://n8n.io/workflows/2006-ai-agent-that-can-scrape-webpages/>

**改进点**：
  * 替代了原执行工作流工具及子流程
  * 移除了响应格式化步骤

### 2. 让AI通过API获取数据

重构自<https://n8n.io/workflows/2094-allow-your-ai-to-call-an-api-to-fetch-data/>

**改进点**：
  * 替代了原执行工作流工具及子流程
  * 无需手动定义查询参数
  * 移除了响应格式化步骤
